about_the_game:
Irving's Legitimate* Salvage Incorporated wants you!

Scavenge space stations for scrip with 3-16 players in this online asymmetric scavenging game. But watch out, some of your crewmates are rival corporate spies tasked with preventing you from meeting quota – by any means necessary!

Your Suit and You


We all know space can be a dangerous place. But not to worry! In partnership with Vacuum Solutions Limited, ILS is proud to provide each employee with a top of the line** All-Purpose Environmental Suit 3000 (APES)! Among its countless features are:

A fully functional*** life support to sustain you on the job
A state of the art Databracer™ that makes computer interfacing as easy as a tap of the wrist!
An integrated radio system that enhances synergy and collaboration with coworkers!

The 3000 model is known to have a few**** issues (mainly due to user error), so in the case of malfunction have a crewmate handy to make some emergency repairs!

Cruising in Style


A crew is nothing without a good vessel! Aboard the USS Behemoth, you’ll never find a need unmet. Keep watch for threats with its cutting-edge CCTV Security System, automatically repair and refill your suit with VSL’s revolutionary Replenishment Chamber, and spend your scrip on useful tools with our advanced Requisitions Hatch!

Occupational Hazards


There are, of course, some hazards aboard the stations you’ll be scavenging. That’s why we’re paying you so much*****, after all! We trust with the training you’ve been given, those pesky critters will do you no harm.



URGENT UPDATE: Recent reports suggest our corporate adversaries have planted agents within our salvaging crews. Be vigilant, keep an eye out for signs of malicious behaviour, and if the need arises, do not hesitate to defend yourself. But above all-

[Incoming Transmission]

Are you there Agent? Don’t worry, your benefactors have supplied you with a myriad of tools to dispose of these pests. Make sure they are unable to meet quota and we’ll make it worth your while.



[Transmission Complete]

-And remember, here at Irving's Legitimate* Salvage Incorporated we aren’t just co-workers. We’re a family!


*: As defined by the Outer Arm Federation, all property taken from residences, installations, or places of business that have been unoccupied for over two months is considered Legitimate Salvage. ILS Ltd. is not liable for any equipment falsely repossessed due to reasonable assumption of vacancy.

**: The APES 3000 was the most advanced and feature complete APES model at time of creation, compared to its counterparts the APES 2500 Lite and APES 2200 Vista.

***: The APES 3000 features a limited life support system that provides oxygen for up to a few minutes. Failure to replenish oxygen supply or repair tank leakages are deemed user errors for which neither Irving's Legitimate Salvage nor Vacuum Solutions Inc are liable.

****: Many.

*****: On average accounting for the unemployed population, your monthly earnings are in the top 80th percentile across the Outer Arm! Consider yourself fortunate.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-7400 CPU @ 3.00Ghz; Shader Model 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050

short_description: A 3-10 player space station scavenging social deduction game. Will you be able to meet quota with your team? Or will you do everything in your power to sabotage them as the traitor?
